verbs.description: [ARGM-MNR: how] [ARG0: one citizen] [V: changed] [ARG1: the way we vote in indianapolis] [ARGM-CAU: because one citizen stepped forward to demand change thousands of voters in indianapolis cast ballots at a time and place convenient for them indianapolis matt tully indiana john windle swarens marion county]
